nodes.text: The chief clansman was a high-ranking member of the Muza species on the planet Muzara. Circa 4000 BBY, the chief clansman and his tribe were involved in a dispute with Human settlers from the Brentaal League. When a Human Jedi Knight named Keval Raffaan arrived and offered to broker a settlement between the rival groups, the chief clansman informed the Jedi that he would first have to prove his worthiness by retrieving a skuhm-leather bag of coins placed by a Muza bravest protector in the ruins of Kabus-Dabeh. The Jedi accepted.
